title: A High-performance Real-time Container File Monitoring Approach Based on Virtual Machine Introspection
summary: As cloud computing continues to advance and become an integral part of modern IT infrastructure, container security has emerged as a critical factor in ensuring the smooth operation of cloud-native applications. An attacker can attack the service in the container or even perform the container escape attack by tampering with the files.
